timeline.bodyText:
The xdoc has the methods indented but the javadoc does not. Please make them similar so it is also easier to read in the Javadoc. The methods should be similarly indented.
@strkkk Please keep an eye out for these type of things.
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,7 +37,20 @@ * 
  * <module name="SuperClone"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * public class Foo {
+ *
+ * public Object clone() {return null;} // violation, does not call super.clone()

timeline.bodyText: Extra space is not needed after the :.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText:
It is not valid java code to have all these clones in 1 single method. Also the examples are not very creative in that they all look very similar.
What about an example where super clone is not called in the return. Like it is assigned to a variable, with some more modifications and then returned.
clone can't have any parameters and can't be native.
Look at the source code of the check to get an idea of some other examples that users may not think of beyond the basics.https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/bd45909e6345b2d3ef5c5472d35a3ad926a31eb9/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/AbstractSuperCheck.java
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,7 +37,20 @@ * 
  * <module name="SuperClone"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * public class Foo {
+ *
+ * public Object clone() {return null;} // violation, does not call super.clone()

timeline.bodyText: violation is on method, not code, so the comment should be on the method. Please update the others.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: Why can't comment go on end of line? Violation is on the method, not before or after it.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: Please remove extra fields , Check do not care about them.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: Please extend some class from jdk, Check do not care about any hierarchy, we should not give use false feeling that consider hierarchy. All classes have such cline method to override.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
Please show example of clone method that return exact class ( FooB ).
Please read #7553 (comment) and articles we reference.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: Violation comment is misplaced, move it to previy line. Same for other comments.
timeline.author: romani
